description: Play Audio in Telegram Voice Chats

API_ID.description: api_id part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: api_hash part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

DYNO_COMMAND.description: Which prefix do you want to use for owner commands? EX- / !

WHITE_COMMAND.description: Which prefix do you want to use for group users? EX- ~ .

BOT_TOKEN.description: Put your telegram bot father bot token
